titles.title: Commemorating the 50th anniversary of Bangladesh's independence.
Commemorating the 50th anniversary of Bangladesh's independence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status
War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the people of Bangladesh on the 50th anniversary of their independence and the historical significance of this milestone to those of Bangladeshi heritage. It also recognizes the contributions of Bangladesh for hosting Rohingya refugees fleeing genocide in Burma (Myanmar).
